name: Yosemite National Park
highlight: Impressive waterfalls and rock formations like El Capitan and Half Dome.

name: Inca Trail
highlight: Historical trail leading to the ancient city of Machu Picchu.

name: Seven Lakes Route
highlight: A trail surrounded by glacial lakes and mountains in the Andes region.

name: Grand Canyon Rim-to-Rim Trail
highlight: A challenging trail that crosses the Grand Canyon from one rim to the other.

name: Camino de Santiago
highlight: A historic pilgrimage route across Spain, ending at Santiago de Compostela.

name: Dolomites Mountains
highlight: Impressive rock formations and panoramic views of the Dolomites Alps.

name: Torres del Paine
highlight: A National Park famous for its mountains, glaciers, and turquoise lakes.

name: Mount Fuji
highlight: The iconic volcano and highest mountain in Japan, famous for its views and nature.

name: Sentiero Azzurro
highlight: A trail that connects the beautiful coastal villages of Cinque Terre.

name: Banff National Park
highlight: Trails with views of Rocky Mountains, turquoise lakes, and wildlife.

name: Annapurna Circuit
highlight: One of the most famous trekking routes in the world, with views of Himalayan peaks.

name: Na Pali Coast Trail
highlight: A trail that runs along the spectacular Na Pali coastline, known for its cliffs and beaches.

name: Laugavegur Trail
highlight: A trail in Iceland offering volcanic landscapes, glaciers, and geysers.

name: Mount Kilimanjaro
highlight: Africa's highest point, a volcanic mountain challenging trekkers to reach its summit.

name: Amazon River
highlight: Explore the world's largest tropical rainforest, home to incredible biodiversity.
